item.title: Get Operating System Name in Java
item.description: In this Java core tutorial, we learn how to get the operating system name in a Java program. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); How to use System.getProperty() static method to get OS name public class Example { public static void main(String[] args) { String osName = System.getProperty("os.name"); System.out.println(osName); } } The output is: Windows 10 Happy Coding ðŸ˜Š
